work.name: DGN Games
work.summary:
Project: Old Vegas Classic Slots Casino
Description: Development and support of a game application for Android/iOS/WebGL platform.
Role: Full time client side engineer and member of development team with Client/Server/QA/Art departments.
Job responsibilities: 
- Implementing new slot games and meta games logic.
- Communication with other teams, planning and estimating features implementation, code review.
- Application optimization and performance issues investigation.
- Creating unit tests and buggfixing.

work.name: Ers Game Studios Llp
work.summary:
Projects: Redemption Cemetery, Puppet Show, Dark Tales, Haunted Legends

Description: Development of HOPA casual games.

Role: Game developer in the company of more than 200 people and a small team of about few developers per project one game designer and army of artists.

Job responsibilities:

Implementation of minigame logic, assembling scenes, implementation of game scenario.
Communication with game designer and art team about achievement of the design idea.
Implementation of programming based animations and effects.
Support and bugfix on other HOPA projects.

education.institution: National Technical University of Ukraine 'Kyiv Polytechnic Institute'

references.name: Paul Rahme
references.reference:
Vitalii is well skilled in both server and client C# and Unity work, and has shown strong competence for technical architecture, planning and proposals for improvements and highly effective refactors to systems, sequences and breakdown of work, dependency + workflow diagrams and flow-charts, keeping management and sub-team members in the loop with progress through sequences of work and merge requests, as well as providing support and feedback on other people's work.

He is also a pleasant natured person to work with, open to code feedback, suggestions and discussions, and keeping track of a bigger picture of future-proofed long term solutions which greatly benefit the larger part of the project going forward.
